mapper.sql: province_id, province_name, province_sort, create_time, modify_time, del_flag
mapper.select:
select
from np_sys_province where del_flag = '0' order by province_sort asc

select
from np_sys_province where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and del_flag='0'
mapper.insert:
insert into np_sys_province
province_id,
province_name,
province_sort,
create_time,
modify_time,
del_flag,
#{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{provinceSort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
mapper.update:
update np_sys_province
province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province_sort = #{provinceSort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update np_sys_province set province_name = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province_sort = #{provinceSort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
